questions.sentence:
Declare three variables: a character array for the satellite name, an integer for the number of years it has been traveling, 
	and a double for the distance in billion mi from Earth. 
	
	Then Assign the variables. Print these values.

		char satellite_Name;
		
		[     ]years_Travel;
		
		double distanceFromEarth; 
		
		   satellite_Name =        
		   years_Travel   =  15
		   distanceFromEarth = 3.17
		
		PRINT Satellite:, satellite_Name
		
			  
	
		PRINT(Distance from Earth:, distanceFromEarth,billion mi)
